Hi, Zoho function url not working in HubSpot webhook. Could anyone please let me know is there any other way to send data from HubSpot to zoho. I have created a app in HubSpot and connect with main account. When we creating a deal or company we want to send data to zoho.

Hey HS ’Devs…I have a use case where we use a HubSpot form on our website. We need to add a country selector to the phone number input field on form.  The goal is to change the phone number format to include the country code. _e.g. <tel:12124567890|1-212-456-7890>: Dialed in the US; or <tel:0012124567890|001-212-456-7890>: Dialed in Germany._

_Any thoughts on how I can go about adjusting the property to accomplish this or would this require some custom work?_

hey all! I'm trying to send a mass email with a unique link for each respective email. I've uploaded the list and have tried couple things; the column which the link is under had the property of single text then i changed it to rich text after speaking to HubSpot sales. The email now includes the unique link however it's not a link it's plain text, any ideas how I could fix that? :slightly_smiling_face:
